QnA_Questions.Quiz_Question_Name: The nominee provided service based on?

Answers.Answer_Name: Gave me what I have asked for only
Fulfilled requirements very well
Given requirements and further improving more than what was needed
Provided services out of his/her own will and outside of the job scope
Able to meet deadlines with little to no supervision
Initiate action to seek information and solve problems
Work with people sincerely to achieve goals
Anticipate potential issues and develops prevention alternatives

QnA_Questions.Quiz_Question_Name: The nominee’s actions were of value because

Answers.Answer_Name: Understand goals and complete assignments within reasonable timeframes
Delivers accuracy, thoroughness and efficiency in execution
Recognizes and understand long term effects of decisions
Actions taken were able to implement a positive change in the organisation

QnA_Questions.Quiz_Question_Name: How did the nominee serviced you?

Answers.Answer_Name: Willing to assist without complaining
Demonstrates enthusiasm, care and concern towards colleagues and clients
Proactively provides updates with both formal and informal communication. Follows up to ensure satisfaction
Takes personal interest in both internal and external matters, goes out of the way to meet their needs

QnA_Questions.Quiz_Question_Name: During tough situations, the nominee was able to…

Answers.Answer_Name: Follows through with the tasks
Ability to produce results regardless of the amount of work
Handled the issue fast and perform outstandingly
Show incredible efforts in achieving exemplary performance

QnA_Questions.Quiz_Question_Name: “Change is the only constant”, how did the nominee apply this statement into his/her work life?

Answers.Answer_Name: Have the skills and knowledge to perform the job competently
Fast at mastering new routines and learning new knowledge
Skilful at improving work methods
Expert, provided solutions/implementations that is added to the current working practices for improvement
Works well with fellow employees without issues
Able to assess possibly consequences and actions by separating important and unimportant affairs
Demonstrate the ability to make sound and timely decisions, accountable for producing quality timely results15
Maintain professional image and expertise in the field despite challenges
